general_advisory: Rainfall is expected during next five days, spray only when sky becomes clear and use sticker to the spray solution. Farmers are advised to do proper arrangement for storing rainwater at one portion in the field. Due to high humidity, possibilities of pest and disease build up, take plant protection measures.

advisory: Collect hybrid or high yielding varieties of paddy with resistance to diseases and insect pests as per the land situations of the farmers from nearby dealers.
Sow dhanicha seeds @ 10 kg/acre prior to transplanting paddy. Apply phosphatic fertilizer in dhaincha fields required for paddy cultivation.
Transplant 15-25 days seedlings. Treat nursery seedlings or root dip uprooted seedlings in the solution of neem oil @ 5ml/litre of water and metalaxyl + mancozeb @ 1.25 g/litre of water.
Complete the sowing of 10 Kg Maize hybrid seed per acre with spacing of 60 cm row to row and 20-25cm between plants.
Spray Atrazine @1Kg/acre within 2 days of sowing to control the weeds in maize field.

This is the optimum time for direct sowing ragi. Sow the seeds @ 4 kg/acre in line at 22.5 cm apart. Apply 35 kg DAP and 17 kg MoP per acre at the time of sowing. Before sowing, seeds should be treated with Carboxin 37.5%+Thiram 37.5% DS @ 2 g/kg seed.
Sow 4Kg seeds of Arjun, Kalua, Bharabi, etc. high yielding ragi varieties per acre.
If bacterial wilting observes in tomato, apply Plantomycin @ 1.0 g and Copper Oxychloride @ 2 g/litre of water.
